page.shortlink: api client api string tobool method

argument.name: explicit
argument.description: Whether or not to force falsy values to be matched.

return.name: value
return.description: The value of the string as a boolean.

page.description: Extension to the native string variable to convert a string into a boolean.

discussion.p: The String.toBool method will use any of the values stores in A5.d.bool.truthy and A5.d.bool.falsy arrays as true and false values.

If the "explicit" argument is set to true then if the value of the string is not found in the A5.d.bool.truthy or A5.d.bool.falsy arrays, a null will be returned. Otherwise a false will be returned whenever the value is not found in the A5.d.bool.truthy array.
